name: Berserker (marcel.design)
description:
Berserker in a first person shooter where the player will use their various super human abilites and parkour skills to traverse the level and defeat enemies. 

The player's superhuman abilites are gained by using a drug called "Berserk". However if used too much the player will overdose causing them to hallunicate and needing to fight off waves of halluncination-based enemies. 

The games art style is inspired by tarintino movies , hip-hop , graphic novels and urban fashion. All of these elements are combined to create a cell-shaded and stylized look. 

A key element in the game's mechanics is the radio system which will allow player to change their music to real world hip-hop and rap music that changes in pitch and tone with the current actions of the player. 

The game is set in a dystopian future in which Bersekers , drug using rebels,  are the only free people in a world governed by an agressive servillance state. You play as one of these berserkers fighting against other Berserker gangs for domiance in the the crowded and slum-like city of Limbo 10.
